channel.title: Comments for page "Sugary Candy"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Sugary Candy"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
I just bought and tried to eat 403 sugary candy… it ate 401 and left 2 in my inventory.

Sugary Candy Used!
+220 Stamina! (220 Max)

You can't help it, and gobble down all your candy at once!
You run around, out of your mind, but you don't end up with anything cool..
Sugar Rush Level: 400
Rush Level Needed: 628

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Can you show proof that you can actually consume more than 401 in a single attempt of consuming Sugary Candies? Otherwise, as far as empirical testing has shown, 401 candies, and as such 400 Sugar Rush, is the maximum obtainable. This would also make sense in that I highly doubt that McM would enable us to get guarenteed Sugar Rush items beyond the first.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Hmm, it says that the max that can be eaten at *ONCE* is 401, but this is very very untrue….that's just what gives you max stamina…you *CAN* eat more, perhaps someone should update the page to fix this mild error in wording that could be confusing to some.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: ah that makes sense, thank you. article could use a rephrase tho' ;)

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
It's worded strangely, agreed… but the reason behind the 401 is posted a few posts back… 401 candies is all you need to attain the 220 stamina.

Eating more is possible, if you really want to attain a sugar rush that high, but it's kind of pointless because often times the sugar level required is plenty low enough to where you won't need to eat more than 401.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
isnt it a little contradicting, that the page says you need 950+ sugar level while on the same page it says you can down no more than 401 at once, resulting in a max possible level of 400.

also, whats the 950 supposed to mean? just got this:

Sugary Candy Used!
+103 Stamina! (220 Max)

You can't help it, and gobble down all your candy at once!
SUGAR RUSH!
You run around, out of your mind! You don't know what you did, but you are back, with a Bow of Windia in your hands!
Sugar Rush Level: 167
Rush Level Needed: 79.6

as you can see i downed 168 candies

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: probably not. Knowing the RNG, someone got the real max once.

item.title: higher req than stated here
item.content:encoded: The sugar rush level required can reach about 1k, a couple of min ago I got one requirement at 984

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: How many Candys exactly do you have to eat at once to get those 220 stamina ?
